website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe, sturdy model that combines maneuverability, versatility, and quality – by far the best Baby Jogger on the market today.
pros: Offers all the best Baby Jogger features, including easy-fold design, precise maneuverability, sun canopy with UV protection, and a reclining seat
Can also be converted to a double stroller that fits car seats, bassinets and more
cons: Some shorter moms found the handle to be a bit high
It's also somewhat on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Collapsed while walking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Stroller for my toddler and new baby and while using it it COLLAPSED!! WOTH MY KIDS IN IT 3 TIMES!!! Won’t be using it again. I’ve contacted the manufacturer and we’ll see what they do. I don’t know what will fix the image of my child hanging helplessly from the stroller and then Falling out...I’m not optimistic I’d trust this company or stroller EVER again. You can’t put a price on child safety once it’s been compromised.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality good stroller but God Almighty
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality good stroller but God Almighty, this thing is huge. I underestimated how big it would be. If you are primarily using it from your front door, maybe it's okay. For us, it's always from the car and it's so big we don't even bring it most of the time due to space. It's hard to fit it in stores also. The big wheels are not as good outside as I had hoped, either. The reversible feature is great and the basket is huge, but we ended up getting a second stroller for travel because of this one's size so I wish I had a jogging stroller instead of this one plus my travel one.
customer_reviews.author: MaLintle

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very easy to assemble. I debated for a very long time purchasing this but so glad I did. Pushes very smoothly and worked well with car seat. I also have City Mini and upgraded to this one for a second baby...I actually like the Select better which I am surprised by! Also I am short and had read reviews that the handlebar is high but it’s very comfortable for me on lowest setting (I’m 5’1”).
customer_reviews.author: Kristin G.

customer_reviews.title: The only stroller you need!
customer_reviews.text: The Baby Jogger City Select is a great workhorse of a stroller. It goes from single to double in a flash and is easy to use as a travel system. The sunshades provide amazing coverage and the seats are comfortable. My only complaint is that it is hard to configure for one seat to be reclined while the other is upright. The one hand controlled telescoping handle makes it easy for me and my husband to switch off pushing. The basket is large enough to hold scooters, helmets, and diaper bags for all of your adventures. The push is great and it handles all terrains really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: On the recommendation of FIVE different people, we registered for and received this stroller for our first child and we LOVE it. It is well made and designed with a smooth ride and smart features. The car seat adapter for the Chicco KeyFit 30 was easy to install and has made transporting our child from the apartment to garage and during errands a breeze. It's not as light as the other smaller models, but I was able to lift it in and out of our trunk within a few days of delivering our child. So happy we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: runslikedeb

customer_reviews.title: The best (single or double) stroller!
customer_reviews.text: BEST stroller I’ve ever used. I wish I had bought this for my first since you can use as a single or double. So so worth it! Not too heavy. Easy to fold. Very comfortable for your kids. Lots of great add ons. Very easy to push. Note* If you’re using as a double and you buy a car seat adapter for your new baby, you still need to buy the second seat adapter. Even though you don’t have two seats yet. Just one seat and a baby car seat. I misunderstood!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Moore

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller for my 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller for my 2 kids. I love how it can be adjusted for any situation your in (1 kid, a baby and toddler, 2 toddlers, etc.) it’s a stroller that can definitely grow with your family. My only complaints are: 1. I had to do a lot of searching for the right adapter for my car seat ( they apparently discontinued the one for mine) 2. It’s definitely not lightweight so it can be difficult to put it in the back of your car.
customer_reviews.author: B-Man

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller but issues with folding
customer_reviews.text: Probably just a fluke in ours, but the handle you pull to fold the stroller is stuck on ours. We've tried working it and greasing it and it won't lift to fold the stroller. We were able to do it ONCE with my husband using all the force he could to pull up that side while I pulled the other side and held the stroller in place... Not ideal and not realistic as we now can't put it in the car... Otherwise, very sturdy and great maneuverability!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Great for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kiddo with low muscle tone who doesn't sit up well just yet. Gives her lots of support and a great view. Love how versatile it is. Downside: it weighs a ton and is really big when folded, so I prefer to take the seat off first, which is a pain. Do NOT recommend for public transit, as it has a wide base and doesn't easily fold. But for all other purposes, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: rachindc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have had two strollers prior to this one. This one is my absolute favorite stroller! We got the second seat to go on it and it’s amazing double stroller! There is so many ways to change the stroller to make it accommodating for everyone. The handle that adjusts is my favorite part because I am tall and now I don’t have to slouch when walking with the kids
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Only stroller you need
customer_reviews.text: I had the city mini and loved it for my daughter. We recently had twins and upgraded to this stroller. It can be used as a single stroller which my daughter loves because she can sit up higher. It is easier to steer and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mhart

customer_reviews.title: “Cadillac of Strollers”
customer_reviews.text: Or atleast that’s what my five year old cousin raves :) This was a baby shower gift but I followed up with my cousin who said it was easy to put together with all the extra attachements (two seats, bassinet kit, glide board, cooler bag, etc). They took it out for spin and it was a smooth ride I am told. Overall I’m glad they like it and it was what they wanted; the overall price was also the best I could find which is always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Solid stroller- lousy options
customer_reviews.text: Works and moves great. More fluid movement than the high-end gracos’. For the steep price, would have expected a couple included storage places and during holders. They are available as accessories. Poorly designed and ill-fittting as they are. The kids drink holder is too shallow to be of any use if you decide to make use of the wheels on the stroller. Stroller great, but needs improvement on the convienicy items.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is very easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very easy to operate. Sounds weird saying that since it’s on wheels, but it maneuvers so smoothly over bumps, grass, smooth curbs and other uneven surfaces without locking up the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So many great features/one problem
customer_reviews.text: I love that this stroller is so compact as a double stroller. It’s a very smooth ride and easy to push even with 2 kids in it. The one thing I don’t like (and it actually drives me crazy) is that the wheel locks on the front seem to come loose a lot and I have to stop to fix them. If it wasn’t for that it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it wasn’t so heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, heavy, heavy! I wanted to love this stroller as many do, and I do, but wish it was 15 pounds lighter. Kids like to ride in it and I figured out how to set it up, dismantle it form YouTube. I struggled to find the right Britax adapters for our infant car seat, found out they were phasing them out due to becoming discontinued. Called the company to ask what adapters I could use and was on hold for 30 mins, no lie!! Couldn’t wait any longer and hung up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this stroller except the folding. It can be a challenge to pull those folding handles in unison to get it to close in on itself. It is a little heavy to pick up and put in vehicle for transport. That said once it's open and in use I LOVE all of the other features. It rides very smooth and has a bunch of configurations for the seats.
customer_reviews.author: edwin overton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Checked out multiple strollers and decided on the Baby Jogger City Select. It came in the mail last night and it was super easy to put together & I am so happy that we went with this stroller! Even my husband loves it! I was going to purchase a BOB but once I found out the tires on this stroller we’re foam vs air I was sold. Only thing to complain about is you do have to purchase accessories of you want them but I don’t feel they are priced too bad. Highly recommend this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: johnathan wireman

customer_reviews.title: Love so much
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is AMAZING! Was between this and Uppababy vista but decided with a tall 2 year old having 2 of the same size seats that can go in either position (vista doesn’t have this option) was best and SO glad with our decision. Anniversary color with leather accents is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: SarahBNP

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! We highly recommend it unless you want to pay a lot more for the newer model that folds smaller and looks a little nicer (but is the same weight). Pro tip: as of now it's eligible for Amazon's baby registry completion discount! 15% off of this thing is a Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Vail

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is everything. Twins on the way and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is everything. Twins on the way and we have a 4 year old. Bought every accessory known to man that fit the city select. I am truly impressed and feel the price DOES match the quality. I was hesitant because... it is expensive. But, 100% worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love: very sturdy stroller, doesn't make noise on the ground, the tires are fantastic, love the different ways to use it. Dislike: sometimes it can be more difficult than it should be to assemble or change a position or fold down, but that's a small price to pay for something that is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Price and Great in Everything
customer_reviews.text: I think it is the best stroller for everyone who is looking for a stroller at an affordable price. One thing I am not happy about is the color: all colors are dark. Other than that everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Polina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love my CS! It has a great push and is so versatile. The size of the basket is fantastic. Unfortunately the frame of the stroller had a creak to it but I contacted Baby Jogger and after submitting a video of the noise, they immediately sent me an entirely new stroller with no hassles. Have already recommended this stroller to several friends!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth R Short

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids 18 months apart so I got this stroller when the 2nd one arrived. First off, I should've just purchased it when I had the 1st one! My husband and I are extremely happy with this purchase. The amount of positive remarks I get just pushing this stroller around is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, smooth to push, and spacious for at least a 5yr olds legs
customer_reviews.text: We got this once we had our third child and it is probably the best stroller we have ever owned! It’s super smooth, tall so you can actually relax while you push, and it can fit up to 4kids if you really needed too! Each kid had plenty of leg room and the basket is large enough to do a small shopping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, compact and lightweight for a double stroller
customer_reviews.text: You will love this stroller! I’ve done a lot of research and reviews helped me make the decision. This is something I will be using for a long time so I expected it wasn’t going to be cheap. Well worth the money. It turns around easily and it’s lightweight. Folds easy and can be stored with out consuming much space in your car. If you need a double stroller look no more. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: B. arega

customer_reviews.title: BEST STROLLER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is straight up sorcery! It rides so smooth and is so durable and easy to assemble and use!! We love it. It is the best in the market!!
customer_reviews.author: Malory Myers

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! I wish I would have bought when I had my first son. It's great. It folds up easily, and is just as easy to put together. I'm not the strongest person, and I don't have any trouble getting it out of the trunk and assembling it in a pinch. I would definitely recommend this stroller to first time parents, as well as growing families.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! I like the wheels made of rubber. But it’s a little over weighted to me. I don’t know if I am able to put it into trunk alone with my baby in hand. Not as convenient as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Had the same stroller that my husband ran over. Ordered this one to replace it. I loved the second and much as the first. Super easy to use and very versatile!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesile

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sports car
customer_reviews.text: Compared to our jogging stroller with suspensions, this feels like driving a sports car... very stiff. But it packs up relatively small. Overall good design. Expensive though!
customer_reviews.author: FromPhilly

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: works great and easy to add more space for growing families
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: We love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: We love this stroller! Second seat is a little tricky with our graco infant seat, but it’s functional especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Can’t wait to use it as a double one I buy the second seat! Super easy to fold up and unfold. It does take two hands so baby or child can’t be held by you when doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Miglia

customer_reviews.title: BEST STROLLER - EASY AND VERSATILE
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down, the best stroller!!!! Easy to fold up, multiple seating options, a huge basket. I definitely recommend this. We had the Britax B-Agile and I HATED it! I ended up biting the bullet and getting this stroller and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte M

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. I am having my second child in October and needed a double stroller option. I wish I had purchased this for my first son as it is amazing and he loves to be in it.
customer_reviews.author: saralizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great! Super easy once you know the break and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great! Super easy once you know the break and locking tab. Folds up quick and unfolds even quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Only down side is, if you need the adapters (sold separately) for the car seat, they can be tricky sometimes! But other wise great!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Elwood

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service too
customer_reviews.text: Great for 2 kids. Terrific storage. The gliding board is a necessary add-on. I had one issue with the frame after 1-1/2 years of heavy use and the experience with customer service exceeded my expectation in every respect.
customer_reviews.author: Brushyneck

customer_reviews.title: I like kids sitting side by side
customer_reviews.text: I returned it in and got Baby Jogger City Mini Double instead. I like kids sitting side by side. This stroller is too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: AnyaS

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: This product is great on paper. All the functionality I was looking for in a stroller however I ended up returning it because it is HUGE! Heavy, bulky, and wide. So sad but I just couldn’t deal with its massiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is AWESOME!! We bought it for our boy/girl twins
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is AWESOME!! We bought it for our boy/girl twins. You have to buy the adapters for the second seat but so worth it!! This stroller is so easy to use and works even on gravel!!
customer_reviews.author: rktekta

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller so far and baby isn't quite here ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller so far and baby isn't quite here yet! I bought this as a warehouse deal and aside from a few scratches on the back support bar, it's like it's brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and it was not too difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this sooner. It's fantastic stroller and comes exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles like a charm even one handed!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZINGLY AWESOME stroller, worth every dime we spent!!! High recommend it! Accessories worth it too❤️
customer_reviews.author: Hes Carrinme

customer_reviews.title: Great for two
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for two! Easy for toddler to get in by herself. Maneuverability is fantastic for a big stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit heavy. Overall it’s a great stroller! Durable lots of space for shopping bags. Baby is very comfortable. It can be used as a double stroller with additional parts.
customer_reviews.author: WATSON’S

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Expecting second baby and if I knew ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Expecting second baby and if I knew before about this stroller I would have bought it since the beginning. I had a Britax b agile and though it was a great stroller this one is more compact and better fit to my baby. He is much more comfortable sitting in this one. In the other one he was like a pea in a pot. I just wish when added the second seat you could have the first one a little bit higher to have more room between them and that seats could be flatten for sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: I love my new stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love my new stroller !! It's everything I wanted. The size of the basket is amazing. This is my first time purchasing a baby jogger and I definitely recommend it . You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! I researched forever and am so happy with our purchase. We have cybex carseats and they work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Glides sooo nicely!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Glides so nicely & is so easy to assemble & even easier to fold up to pack away! Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller Out!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stroller, rides smoothly, compact and surprisingly lightweight! I transitioned it into a double stroller (with the purchases of additional adapters) and it's awesome for my two little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Walkmama

customer_reviews.title: Definately Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome! I was looking for a stroller that had a bassinet or full seat recline. I first purchased the Chico Urban because it was cheaper and the same brand as our carseat. It was definitely cheaper in both price and quality so I returned it. Then I went ahead and spent the money on this one. It is great quality! I especially love the tires which work great even on snow. Now I can take my son out of his carrier to go places and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two rugrats on the go
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same as the seat that came with our City Select. Perfect for two rugrats on the go.
customer_reviews.author: kent hall

customer_reviews.title: We are using this as a double stroller and it has been amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: We also bought the second seat kit and the britax adapters. We are using this as a double stroller and it has been amazing so far. There is tons of storage space on the bottom which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Received item quickly to my APO! Box was labeled as the 2014 model, which I knew it wasn't a 2016. Great price! Great double stroller. I don't love the straps on the seat. They are not adjustable via clips like my 2014 BJ city mini single. Stroller is easily adjusted from single to double and you can easily switch seat positions. I did have to order the car seat adapter and extra seat adapter which I ordered from Amazon too. Overall very happy with it this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Im a first time mom and got a stroller at our babyshower and it was a decent stroller bt it was too big for our trunk so i looked around and chose this one because it can grow with my little family and i wont have to spend a couple hundred on a new stroller for the next child, just the extra seat attachment. I love the space at the bottom and the different position you can do with the seat. I love how the stroller can go "off roading" ive taken it on sand, gravel, dirt, grass and the usual concrete and it handles it fine. Even going up or down on curbs or going over bumps is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Forever

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! I had a Bob with our first but didn't want the double Bob since it's so large. I loved my Bob but kinda wish I would have just bought this one the first time around. It's great that I can use it as a single or double stroller depending if I have all the kids with me or not. The frame is a little on the heavy side but nothing that's not manageable. It rolls really smooth and turns very easy!!
customer_reviews.author: love amazon

customer_reviews.title: STOP.....buy this stroller!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg stop looking at strollers and get this!!!! It's perfect for 1,2 or 3 children. It's so easy to use and family friendly. Well worth the money!! (Update) now that we have used this bad boy some I have to say.....AMAZING!!!! Don't waist your money on any other stroller. We use it daily. It is smooth to push, light weight and super user friendly!!! My husband is 6.5 and I'm 5.0 so a stroller that adjust to our height differences was a must. This stroller was perfect for us. Read all the reviews you want but, seriously this was worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: TMama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!!! It's a bit heavy, but it's easy to fold and pop open. It rides so smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it. Come on now, it will hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Get it. Come on now, it will hold three of the people you will ever value the most in this life.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: We really love our City Select stroller. We are using as a double with the infant carrier and seat at the moment. Super versatile, easy to steer, and great quality! Plenty of space underneath, which is a must! We can fit a large diaper bag, my large purse and additional small items if need be. Definitely get your money's worth with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Glaeser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Mom and dad are very happy with this stroller! We can go everywhere with it, we just went to a spartan race and did awesome on the rocks. Takes some space in the car but we manage by using more small luggage in seat of a big bag. Is a little heavy but you'll get use to! I'm a skinny mom (122lb) and I carry the stroller to a second floor.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have 6 kids and we've gone through loads of strollers, from super cheap to moderately pricey but this is by far the most expensive and best quality stroller we have ever bought. Great stroller, my wife and I like it a lot and it is built very well. Rolls very smooth, no frame flexing, handles 3 of my kids with the option standing board on the back. The only gripe we have is that everything has to be bought as an add-on like the tray and cup holder. We haven't used the tray we bought more than 3 times and we could use the cup holder lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller but tons of add-ons are required
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for the price. I bought this "Very Good - Open Box" and it seriously looks brand new. Love it! ONly downside is that all the stachments are extra this is a barebones stroller just one seat
customer_reviews.author: richardx

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! If you have/planning 2 kids it's a great investment ! So easy to fold and transport ! Safe and sturdy !
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of Strollers.
customer_reviews.text: Life saver! This stroller is amazing! We have been everywhere with it and it is still going strong almost a year later. Very durable! Very easy to operate! Buy it on sale if you can, but you won't regret spending money on this Cadillac.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Our Daughters Love It
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2, we have twins having babies 1 month apart. Arrived in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Schram

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Great service would order again. Met my expectations stroller came within a week. Love everything about it. Great
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: unhappy Amazon customer
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. The recipients are having trouble with a clasp that won't work. Amazon won't talk to the recipients, they didn't place the order. We don't want to replace it just fix it. The return policy for baby products says 6 months but when we try to return, it says 3 months. Can not find a place on this website to get help. Amazon can be great but in this case they stink. The stroller broke, they won't fix it or let me return it. Unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Not a double stroller if using the Uppababy Mesa Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed to find out the City Select will not work as a double stroller if you're using the Uppababy Mesa car seat. Baby Jogger sells an adapter for the Mesa car seat, but the City Select cannot fit the Mesa car seat with a toddler seat. I wish City Select included this note in their product description. It would have saved a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS AMAZING! It's so easy to fold/unfold
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS AMAZING! It's so easy to fold/unfold, steer, control, etc. This was my major splurge out of all the baby things we needed to get and it was totally worth it. I love that we can have it for when we have our next little one too! I seriously have zero regret spending this much money on this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: i have this stroller and my sister tried it before her baby was born and said this is the only stroller she wants! She loves it and uses it almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

product_meta.title: Baby Jogger City Select Stroller - 2016 | Baby Stroller with 16 Ways to Ride, Goes from Single to Double Stroller | Quick Fold Stroller, Onyx
product_meta.description: Color:OnyxOur most versatile yet, the City Select stroller grows with your family and could be the only stroller you'll ever need. This designer stroller boasts 16+ available configurations to fit your family's needs. It easily becomes a luxury baby stroller with the bassinet kit accessory. Add any of the 16+ available accessories and it becomes an all-in-one stroller, able to meet your family's needs ... even as its growing. with lots of premium strollers on the market, the City Select's ability to grow with your family, even when its still growing, provides one of the only strollers that can truly go the distance..
feature_bullets: The Stroller: Our most versatile yet, the City Select grows with your family and could be the only convertible stroller you'll ever need
The Fold: Patented quick fold technology allows stroller to fold in one step

Configurations: Our luxury strollers allow you to create a custom system. City Select can become a double stroller with 16 unique combinations using second seats, bassinets and car seat adaptors (double conversion kits sold separately)

Seat: Multiple recline positions with a 45 pound. weight capacity per seat. The seat should be washed in cold water on the delicate cycle of your washing machine and attached back onto the stroller to dry
Canopy: UB 50+ sun canopy can be adjusted for differing head heights
